name: Psylocybin
description:
-Preface-

Feeling exiled from the community, you make the hard decision to admit yourself to a psychiatric hospital. Failing to recognize what is real and what's in your head you can no longer trust yourself and reach out for help.

You've never felt so alone, yet something won't leave you be.

-Controls-

Standard First Person controls

WASD - Movement
Mouse - Look
Left Shift - Run
Left Mouse Button - Open Doors

Some contextual actions that are displayed in menus/cinematics

-Ending words-

I have had the idea for this game for a long time, it has gone through various story lines all revolving around a similar idea. The key element is dealing with mental illness and how society has treated those that suffer. Recordings in game were pulled directly from the 1979 film "Anyplace but here", I recommend watching this documentary, while from a time that had much less understanding of mental illness it still stands as a pivotal point for understanding those that suffer directly and their families. 

I hope you enjoy this experience, that so far is my most proud and meaningful piece.
